data.enText: to combine two or more things so that they work together; to combine with sth else in this way

data.chText: 这些程序将和你的已有软件可综合成整体。
data.enText: These programs will integrate with your existing software.

data.chText: 这些程序能和你的已有的软件整合成一体。
data.enText: These programs can be integrated with your existing software.
to become or make sb become accepted as a member of a social group, especially when they come from a different culture

data.chText: 他们完全没有尝试融入本地社区。
data.enText: They have not made any effort to integrate with the local community.

data.chText: 这项政策旨在使有特殊需要的儿童融入普通学校。
data.enText: The policy is to integrate children with special needs into ordinary schools.

simple_means.memory_skill: integr 完整 + ate 使… → 使结合

tr: make into a whole or make part of a whole
example: She incorporated his suggestions into her proposal
The students at this school integrate immediately, despite their different backgrounds

tr: open (a place) to members of all races and ethnic groups

value.def: If someone integrates into a social group, or is integrated into it, they behave in such a way that they become part of the group or are accepted into it.

example.ex: He didn't integrate successfully into the Italian way of life...
example.tran: 他没有顺利地融入到意大利的生活方式中。

example.ex: Integrating the kids with the community, finding them a role, is essential...
example.tran: 使孩子融入社区并为他们找到某个角色非常必要。

example.ex: The way Swedes integrate immigrants is, she feels, 100% more advanced...
example.tran: 她觉得瑞典人帮助移民适应当地生活的方式百分百地更为先进。

example.ex: If they want to integrate, that's fine with me.
example.tran: 如果他们想加入,我没有意见。

example.ex: He thinks we are living in a fully integrated, supportive society.
example.tran: 他认为我们生活在一个完全和谐、相互扶持的社会里。

example.ex: ...the integration of disabled people into mainstream society.
example.tran: 残疾人士跟主流社会的融合

value.def: When races integrate or when schools and organizations are integrated, people who are black or belong to ethnic minorities can join white people in their schools and organizations.

example.ex: Schools came to us because they wanted to integrate...
example.tran: 学校来向我们寻求帮助是因为他们想让不同种族的学生得到平等待遇。

example.ex: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
example.tran: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

value.tran: (使)(种族)融合;使取消种族隔离

example.ex: ...a black honor student in Chicago's integrated Lincoln Park High School.
example.tran: 在芝加哥兼收黑人和白人学生的林肯公园高中就学的一名黑人优等生

example.ex: Lots of people in Chicago don't see that racial border. They see progress towards integration.
example.tran: 在芝加哥很多人看不到那条种族边界。他们看到的是朝向种族融合的进步。

value.def: If you integrate one thing with another, or one thing integrates with another, the two things become closely linked or form part of a whole idea or system. You can also say that two things integrate .

example.ex: Integrating the pound with other European currencies could cause difficulties...
example.tran: 把英镑与欧洲其他货币合并会引发许多难题。

example.ex: Ann wanted the conservatory to integrate with the kitchen...
example.tran: 安想把温室与厨房打通。

example.ex: Little attempt was made to integrate the parts into a coherent whole...
example.tran: 在把各部分结合成一个连贯的整体方面几乎未作任何尝试。

example.ex: Talks will now begin about integrating the activities of both companies.
example.tran: 关于合并两家公司业务的谈判现在将会开始。

value.tran: (使)(与…)成为一体;(使)结合;(使)合并

example.ex: There is, he said, a lack of an integrated national transport policy.
example.tran: 他指出，目前缺乏一个统一的全国交通运输政策。

example.ex: ...a more integrated approach to land uses in a rural environment.
example.tran: 农村土地利用更趋协调的方法

example.ex: With Germany, France has been the prime mover behind closer European integration.
example.tran: 法国与德国一道,一直是更加紧密的欧洲一体化进程的主要推动者。

partsOfSpeech.dec: dis 分开 + integr 完整 + ate 使… → 使瓦解
integr 完整 + al …的 → 完整的
integr 完整 + ate 使… → 使结合
integr 完整 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 完整
